title: Exploratory Visual Analysis
description: In this assignment, I conducted exploratory data analysis to see if there is a relationship between corporate landlords & evictions in the Boston Area. To read more go to: https://sophiegr.github.io/A2/

title: Visualization Design
description: In this assignment, I sketched 3 visualizations, and then crafted a single visualization from a small dataset. To read more go to: https://sophiegr.github.io/A3/

title: Persuasive or Deceptive Visualization?
description: In this assignment, I grappled with how to design visualizations ethically by crafting two different, opposing perspectives to the same question posed about a single dataset. To read more go to: https://sophiegr.github.io/A4/
